pathAssistantSteps.info:
You have now completed your Product Request

 

Congratulations!
Defining a product request to ensure that you have clearly defined the Overall Product, and specified the team members that will be involved
Designing the professional advantage product is all about ensuring that you have associated all the products that this customer can utilise as part of the engagement.
Activating the Professional Advantage product so that the customer can checkout online and use this product to pay for the course.
